ygData.subject: Re: [EQ_SMITHS] Resizing
ygData.msgSnippet: You have to size the armor when you create (use large/small/medium molds with the sheets of metal or anything else that s needed.)  Once the armor is created
ygData.messageBody:
You have to size the armor when you create (use large/small/medium molds
with the sheets of metal or anything else that's needed.) Once the armor is
created you cannot change it's size.


--Khelan Bard of 52 Songs lost somewhere on Tarew Marr.

----- Original Message -----
From: <matosvr@...>
To: <EQ_SMITHS@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Tuesday, May 01, 2001 1:24 PM
Subject: [EQ_SMITHS] Resizing


> Anyone have any info on resizing armor and what you need to do this?
> Will resizing work with Banded? Plate? Dyed Plate? Cultural? Ive
> tried placing pieces of armor in a forge with a scaler to see what
> happens and I get the message "These items do not combine...blah blah
> blah" Ive also tried adding a flask of water and nothing.
>
> Arud Bastad
> 41 Bard of Bristlebane
